cta.title: Ready to simplify your work with
cta.description: Join over 500,000 users who trust E-PDF's for their PDF documents. Free, fast and secure.

seo.title: E-PDF's: Your complete solution for PDF document management
seo.paragraph1: E-PDF's is the most complete free online platform for all your PDF file management needs. Whether you need to merge PDFs, split a PDF document, compress PDF files to reduce their size, or convert images to PDF, our tools are designed to be simple, fast and efficient.
seo.paragraph2: Our online PDF tools work directly in your browser, without requiring any software installation. Your documents stay on your device, ensuring complete privacy of your data. With over 10 million files processed, E-PDF's has become the reference for free PDF editing.
seo.paragraph3: Discover our features: merge multiple PDFs, extract PDF pages, add a watermark, rotate pages, convert Word to PDF, PDF to JPG, and much more. All our tools are 100% free and unlimited.

allTools.title: All
allTools.subtitle: Discover our complete collection of tools to manage, convert and modify your PDF files. More than 20 free tools for all your PDF document needs.
allTools.secureDesc: Your files stay on your device
allTools.ctaTitle: Need help choosing the right tool?
allTools.ctaDescription: Return to the home page to discover our most popular tools and how they can help you.
allTools.guideTitle: Complete guide to online PDF tools
allTools.guideIntro: E-PDF's offers a complete suite of free PDF tools to meet all your document management needs. Whether you're a professional, student or individual, our tools are designed to be simple and effective.
allTools.organizeDesc: Use our tools to merge multiple PDFs into one document, split a large PDF into separate files, or reorganize pages to your needs.
allTools.convertDesc: Easily transform your files with our converters: JPG to PDF, Word to PDF, Excel to PDF, and vice versa. All popular formats are supported.
allTools.modifyDesc: Add a watermark, page numbers, or rotate your PDF pages. Our modification tools give you full control over your documents.
